attributes.action: Scrap Final Salary pensions for all Civil Servants earning above £40,000 per annum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that pay for Private Sector workers and Civil Servants is at parity (if not reversed in favour of the public sector many areas) it is grossly unfair that the taxpayer should fund a pension for a public servant that he himself cannot enjoy.
